Birmingham.Alabama Power Headquarters Building: The Alabama Power Headquarters Building is an 18 story (98 m), corporate headquarters building located in Birmingham, Alabama. The building, completed in 1990, is part of the Alabama Power Headquarters Complex which is composed of four office buildings, two parking desks, and two parking lots. The four buildings contain an estimated 1,200,000 square feet (110,000 m2) and house over 5,000 employees.
